About Me

Hi, I'm Giuseppe Saccardi, graduate in Mathematics at the University of Trento! Currently engaged in the role of Reply Ambassador! Passionate about Data Science and Artificial Intelligence, I am also a technology and renewable energy enthusiast. At the moment I am looking for a job that allows me to work with outstanding and cutting-edge people that will enhance my professional profile! In my free-time I love walking in nature, listening to Podcasts about tech, culture and news, and watching football on TV. Things I am a myth in? I know the secret for cooking the best risotto with prawns!
